cnd6:17.5: paṭipassaddhā → paṭippassaddhā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed), sukhappaṭisaṃvedī → sukhapaṭisaṃvedī (bj, sya-all)
cnd6:17.6: poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ → pokhānupokhaṃ (sya-all), udakūmikajātaṃ → udakomikajātaṃ (bj), avīci santati sahitaṃ → avici saṃgisahitaṃ (cck) | avici samaṅgi sahitaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed), phassitaṃ → phussitaṃ (bj) | phusitaṃ (sya-all)
